body:
Hello Again Avicus Network
I livestreamed the Unofficial Tournament on Monday Morning 2AM (AEST) and I thought that I would record and upload the final battle! Enjoy! The following link will send you to the final battle posted on my YouTube Channel. 
(https://youtu.be/Ue_q2oLU9AA)
body_tagged:

(https://youtu.be/Ue_q2oLU9AA)
title: Bad Company VS Apollo (The Final Battle)

replies.body:
I recommend using this texture pack when streaming. Takes out everything that you need to make the view for the people watching clear but keeps all the important stuff like chat, scoreboard, e.t.c.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CfOc9_vCvGk
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
f1 it's a crime ;) and thanks for following my whole journey back from the wool :)

One thing, you don't seem to have much idea of what's going on for example something really important is being mentioned in communication yet you are walking in the opposite direction. Nothing particularly bad and i guess it will come with experience.
replies.body_tagged:
f1 it's a crime ;) and thanks for following my whole journey back from the wool :)

One thing, you don't seem to have much idea of what's going on for example something really important is being mentioned in communication yet you are walking in the opposite direction. Nothing particularly bad and i guess it will come with experience.

replies.body:
Some things to improve on:
Tell people what ts you're in, either apollos or bad company.
Don't be f1, as everyone els said :p
Get some informatin on how things work in the community, skybridges, icaruses, defeneses and so on. Don't be afraid to ask anyone of  the staff team for support on this.
